did.unittitle: New York City Office of Collective Bargaining Historical Materials, 1992
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: "How Bargaining Got Started" by Jesse Simons

scopecontent.p: This collection consists of an article by Jesse Simons, "How Bargaining Got Started," published in The Chief: NYC Civil Service Paper in 1992. Also included is a letter of transmittal from Simons to Richard Strassberg.

controlaccess.corpname: New York City Office of Collective Bargaining.
New York (N.Y.). Office of Collective Bargaining.

accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.p: New York City Office of Collective Bargaining Historical Materials #5921m. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
